title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Beauty and the Beast
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song (Beauty and the Beast)
description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Thelma & Louise
description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns into a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

title: JFK
description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

title: Boyz n the Hood
description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

title: The Addams Family
description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

title: Point Break
description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

title: Cape Fear
description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

title: Hook
description: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

title: The Fisher King
description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

title: Barton Fink
description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

title: My Own Private Idaho
description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

title: City Slickers
description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

title: Fried Green Tomatoes
description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

title: Bugsy
description: The story of how Bugsy Siegel started Las Vegas.

title: The Prince of Tides
description: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

title: Backdraft
description: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
description: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

title: Father of the Bride
description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

title: What About Bob?
description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, a highly manipulative obsessive-compulsive, tracks him down during his family vacation.

title: The Rocketeer
description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned.

title: New Jack City
description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

title: Jungle Fever
description: A successful black lawyer engages in an interracial affair with his white secretary, leading to fallout within their families and communities.

title: The Commitments
description: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

title: Defending Your Life
description: In an afterlife resembling the present-day US, people must prove their worth by showing in court how they have demonstrated courage.

title: Slacker
description: A camera follows various misfits and eccentrics through a day in the life of Austin, Texas.

title: Delicatessen
description: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

title: Naked Lunch
description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

title: Raise the Red Lantern
description: China in the 1920s. After her father's death, 19-year-old Songlian is forced to marry Chen Zuoqian, the lord of a powerful family. Fifty-year-old Chen already has three wives, each of them living in a separate house within the great castle.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: Dead Again
description: A woman who has lost her memory is taken in by a Los Angeles orphanage, and a private investigator is enlisted to track down her identity.

title: Soapdish
description: Ambitious TV soap actress Celeste Talbert has problems with her show's producer, who is trying to get her to leave, by bringing back her old flame and hiring her niece.

title: L.A. Story
description: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 90s Los Angeles.

title: Hot Shots!
description: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
description: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

title: The Doors
description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

title: A Brighter Summer Day
description: A boy experiences first love, friendship, and the injustice of adult life amidst the street gangs of 1960s Taipei.

title: Only Yesterday
description: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while remembering her childhood in Tokyo.

title: Night on Earth
description: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

title: Dogfight
description: In 1963, on the night before they leave for Vietnam, a group of young Marines set out to play a cruel game: who can bring the ugliest date to a party?
